name: Technophobia
description:
Welcome to Technophobia! A virus investigation minigame inspired by Phasmophobia.

Investigate the motherboard, identifying the virus by measuring data flows from components and comparing it to the envidence in your journal.

Good luck in your investigation! Please let us know what you think.

Controls:
Movement          W A S D
Interact                 E
Journal                  J

Credits:
Programmer          Charlie Gallie
Art                               Sasha Gallie
Music                         Kevin MacLeod: 8Bit Dungeon Level
